nodes.text: We'll hold this position until the paperwork catches up with us.
nodes.speaker: Border Guard Captain

nodes.text: And now the Préfecture reports a legitimate claimant... sheltered at the Château des Vignes. Perhaps even a suitable candidate?
nodes.speaker: Border Guard Captain

nodes.text: Welcome to the Préfecture, Madame. Your dossier has been processed. We are at your service.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Bonjour, Madame. The morning reports are on your desk.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Bon après-midi, Madame. The afternoon briefing is scheduled for fifteen-hundred.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Bonsoir, Madame. The evening dispatches require your signature.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Bonjour, Monsieur. The morning reports are on your desk.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Bon après-midi, Monsieur. The afternoon briefing is scheduled for fifteen-hundred.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Gendarmes with faces like functionaries? Is this a state of exception? What paperwork is this?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: They refused me entry to the Grand Hôtel yesterday. That place... the terroir is unsettling.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Bonjour, outsider.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Your movements have been noted. I'd recommend consistency.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: The Préfecture takes some getting used to, doesn't it?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: How may the Préfecture assist you?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Un peu.
nodes.speaker: Avant-Poste Sentry

nodes.text: Bienvenue de retour, Utobitha. C'est l'heure !
nodes.speaker: Avant-Poste Sentry

nodes.text: Maintenant, j'ai presque peur de demander, mais tu vois des... tu sais... menaces là-bas ?
nodes.speaker: Avant-Poste Sentry

nodes.text: Des menaces partout autour de nous... qui convergent... comme un nœud coulant qui se resserre ! Des gens-ours à deux têtes sur des bovins de combat !
nodes.speaker: Avant-Poste Sentry

nodes.text: Pas les terribles bovins de combat dressés pour chasser les mutants ?
nodes.speaker: Avant-Poste Sentry

nodes.text: Moe, le Centaure ? Notre Centaure préféré, Moe ? Qu'est-ce qu'il fabrique ?
nodes.speaker: Avant-Poste Sentry

nodes.text: Your dossier is now flagged for Durendal protocols!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Officer

nodes.text: Execute Article 17! The traitor forfeits all protections!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Officer

nodes.text: What is the procedure, Monsieur le Préfet?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

conditions.place: Préfecture archives or secure administrative chamber

nodes.text: Once the dossier is sealed, his name will be struck from every register — expunged from all administrative memory.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Your service has been logged. Compensation will be issued in bullion, as per the standard schedule.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: I will remain to complete the final inventory. You are to report directly to the Préfet. Your dossier requires his personal endorsement.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Your dossier is flagged with multiple infractions. Hardly the terroir we seek in the Notariat. Rectify your standing with the Préfecture, and perhaps we can reconsider your application.
nodes.speaker: Notariat Clerk

nodes.text: You wish to join the Notariat? The standards are exacting, and the paperwork is eternal. Are you certain your constitution can withstand the scrutiny?
nodes.speaker: Notariat Clerk

nodes.text: I only discuss the terroir with those who understand its value.
nodes.speaker: Vigneron Merchant

nodes.text: The paperwork is already filed elsewhere. It's of no consequence to me.
nodes.speaker: Vigneron Merchant

nodes.text: Yes, I thought as much. Your appreciation was purely... administrative.
nodes.speaker: Vigneron Merchant

nodes.text: Bien sûr, Monsieur le Préfet.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Bien sûr, Monsieur le Préfet.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: I am at your disposal, Chef de Bureau.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: After you, Chef de Bureau.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Try the main infestation zone, 'Section 7-B: Abandoned Quarry,' out east along the Autoroute de l'Est.
nodes.speaker: Territorial Adjutant

nodes.text: You've seen the reports for 'Cluster G-5: The Grotto'? It's a significant one. It's a long trek due north of Préfecture-Cité, in the Zone de Réserve... very far from proper administration.
nodes.speaker: Territorial Adjutant

nodes.text: Their designated 'Curators' have... concerning capabilities. Energy siphons, neural inhibitors... unpleasant things. Maintain regulation distance and engage with ranged protocols if the situation permits.
nodes.speaker: Territorial Adjutant

nodes.text: You'll find Marchais at the Hôtel des Voyageurs in the Quartier des Jardins of the Hexagon.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Once we have it back, the Préfet can use it to activate the Durendal protocols at the Temple of Reason, and reseal the administrative barriers between the Ancien Régime and our republic.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: If the Sceau is truly the key to restoring the barriers between our world and the Ancien Régime, you must waste no time in recovering it.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Indubitably. The sky is a perfect administrative blue.
nodes.speaker: Local Functionary

nodes.text: Good day.
nodes.speaker: Local Functionary

nodes.text: Quite.
nodes.speaker: Local Functionary

nodes.text: Have you had any correspondence with the Sous-Préfet Marchais lately?
nodes.speaker: Local Functionary

nodes.text: Bonjour! How fares the terroir of your morning?
nodes.speaker: Local Functionary

nodes.text: Come, you must need a meal and a bed. The terroir here is restorative.
nodes.speaker: Family Member

nodes.text: I will rest, but first I must see to our guest's paperwork. The Préfecture requires proper documentation.
nodes.speaker: Family Member

nodes.text: Chloé!
nodes.speaker: Family Member

nodes.text: Étienne! My love! Your dossier is marked 'returned'... I was so afraid it would be 'lost'...
nodes.speaker: Family Member

nodes.text: If not for my associate here, your file would still be in the 'pending' tray.
nodes.speaker: Family Member

nodes.text: Au revoir.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: Sans aucun doute. Le ciel est d'une clarté remarquable.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: Avez-vous eu des nouvelles du Préfet Marchais récemment?
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: En effet.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: Bonjour! Comment allez-vous par cette belle matinée?
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: Pardon?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Monsieur le Préfet.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Madame la Préfète.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: I knew the Préfecture would send someone.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Were my instructions not sufficiently clear?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Do not delay the proceedings. The Hexagon's patience is... limited.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Ah, ah, ah. Look what the terroir has delivered to us.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Guard

nodes.text: By the Hexagon's stamp, we have an unauthorized presence!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Guard

nodes.text: Alert the Préfecture! Alert the Préfecture!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Guard

nodes.text: Your papers are not valid for this location!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Guard

nodes.text: There. Confirmed.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Guard

nodes.text: Take care, my friend. The paperwork for a death is... considerable.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: Good luck. And don't underestimate the Notariat. Their stamps are sharper than they look.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: Try not to worry so much, my dear. The terroir will provide.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: I'm running out of patience with the Sous-Préfet.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: Goodbye. And thank you for your cooperation.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: Until next time.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: I'm not certain how to file this incident.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: New arrivals in the département usually mean additional paperwork.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: I'd recommend avoiding any unfamiliar faces.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: External consultants are always disrupting our filing systems.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: I don't understand why outsiders feel compelled to disturb our established procedures.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: I'm astonished the Gardien des Portes was eliminated.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Look at this. I found it on a dead rat. A truly enormous one! This seeped from its carcass — here, take it!
nodes.speaker: Eccentric Citizen

nodes.text: Mon dieu! Keep your distance, you filthy creature!
nodes.speaker: Eccentric Citizen

nodes.text: Ah, but you are simply the most charming little thing!
nodes.speaker: Eccentric Citizen

nodes.text: Yes? Well, don't just stand there — speak!
nodes.speaker: Eccentric Citizen

nodes.text: It has been an age since I've had to process a corpse. The paperwork is dreadful.
nodes.speaker: Eccentric Citizen

nodes.text: One, two, three — quickly, before I lose the count — five, six, seven... Zut! I've lost the count.
nodes.speaker: Eccentric Citizen

nodes.text: The Hexagon will soon review your file.
nodes.speaker: Archivist

nodes.text: My office hours are concluded.
nodes.speaker: Archivist

nodes.text: Be cautious, colleague. I know you've navigated many audits, but the Durendal archives are not to be approached without proper authorization.
nodes.speaker: Archivist

nodes.text: I should have the final authorization stamp for the procedure soon. It's only a matter of routing now.
nodes.speaker: Archivist

nodes.text: I believe I am close to interpreting more of the procedure. I hope to have filed the preliminary report by the time you return with the required artifact from the old regime.
nodes.speaker: Archivist

nodes.text: I am still processing the second dossier required for the access protocol. I believe I am close to interpreting the relevant regulation.
nodes.speaker: Archivist

nodes.text: If you need to understand heavy plate, you'll want to speak with the Maître d'Armes at the Atelier Durendal.
nodes.speaker: Local Functionary

nodes.text: The Relais du Roi is a decent establishment. The family treats everyone with proper respect.
nodes.speaker: Local Functionary

nodes.text: They say they treat every patron as if they were signing a decree. In my experience, it's accurate.
nodes.speaker: Local Functionary

nodes.text: For light leatherwork and mobility, you should consult the Maîtresse Tanner at the Guildhall.
nodes.speaker: Local Functionary

nodes.text: Her understanding of the craft is... comprehensive. She can show you things the manuals omit.
nodes.speaker: Local Functionary

nodes.text: She's exceptional. I understand she accepts apprentices, provided the paperwork is in order.
nodes.speaker: Local Functionary

nodes.text: The Notariat clerks seem... agitated today.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: I pulled night shift at the Archives. Curse my luck. Being that close to the Original Documents gives me the creeps.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: I don't see how the Republic can function without a Président.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Garçon! A glass for my colleague!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: So, here we all are. It certainly is a well-appointed office.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: This office is a death warrant! We're being transferred out, one by one!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: The Préfecture has a new Préfet. And with Marchais managing the daily correspondence, we should be in order.
nodes.speaker: Notariat Clerk

nodes.text: It could be worse. The Hexagon could simply dissolve our bureau. I hope they don't.
nodes.speaker: Notariat Clerk

nodes.text: We'll just have to trust Marchais, and keep our signatures consistent.
nodes.speaker: Notariat Clerk

nodes.text: We can't discuss it. Just process your forms. If Marchais requires something, he will issue a directive.
nodes.speaker: Notariat Clerk

nodes.text: My dear colleague, I do not circulate rumors. I author them.
nodes.speaker: Notariat Clerk

nodes.text: Have you lost your mind? My pension is on the line and the entire Notariat is at stake! We don't have time for this frivolity!
nodes.speaker: Notariat Clerk

nodes.text: Just saw the new adjoint from the Notariat. Another 'desk hero', if you ask me.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: A black market? Near the Préfecture? Like that's news? There must be a dozen of them.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: I hear Sous-Préfet Marchais plans to send both new clerks out on the next audit. You know what it's about?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: There were three discrepancies in the Languedoc ledgers? And the new adjoint didn't let any slide? I like that.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Didn't Marchais give the new clerk another assignment? Something in the compliance line?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: How do you like the bottom stamp on the vermin report? Not bad, eh?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Submit the required forms in triplicate, and then we can discuss your... condition.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: What makes you think my office would have any record of such a thing?
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: I suggest you petition the Préfecture in the Capital. The Préfet will be... intrigued by your dossier.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Travel there, request an audience. Given the nature of your file, I believe he may grant you a hearing.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: The Notariat might have precedents. Consult Maître Dubois; he may be able to interpret the relevant statutes.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Return in twenty-four hours. I shall have the authorization ready for you then.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: The ledgers are practically empty. When was our last new contract? I can't even recall.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Clerk

nodes.text: Recruitment has stalled. Completely. This is becoming a structural issue.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Clerk

nodes.text: Was it Adjudant Marchais who joined last? Or perhaps that clerk from the southern bureau? The paperwork blurs together.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Clerk

nodes.text: There's talk in the corridors. The Compagnie Noire is absorbing all the Notariat's contracts. Some say their charter won't be renewed.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Clerk

nodes.text: The Notariat is accepting applications again. A decent way to earn a stipend, if you can handle the forms.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Clerk

nodes.text: Anyone with idle hands should file with the Notariat. I understand their personnel quotas are perpetually unfilled.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Clerk

nodes.text: The border with the Atius has been quiet. Good. All this fighting is stupid. What are they fighting about? Just pride. Stupid pride.
nodes.speaker: Retired Clerk

nodes.text: East of the city, where the Rougeau River begins, there's a shrine to Marianne. The old one, not the stamp.
nodes.speaker: Retired Clerk

nodes.text: You have to be careful. You don't want the Préfecture taking notice. Keep your head down. Keep your papers in order.
nodes.speaker: Retired Clerk

nodes.text: I was with the Notariat. The black ledger side. I'm out now. Retired. Too old for that foolishness. I don't keep up contacts. You get out, you stay out.
nodes.speaker: Retired Clerk

nodes.text: It's just a sport. Climbing the spires. The Gendarmerie doesn't like it, but you don't climb when the Gendarmes are standing around.
nodes.speaker: Retired Clerk

nodes.text: This city life is killing me. Work all day. Drop dead, and they toss you in the Lac des Morts. Just need to make my money at the Colisée and live easy.
nodes.speaker: Retired Clerk

nodes.text: Gérard Marchais. The Écuries du Soleil can stable your mount, or sell you one, if you wish.
nodes.speaker: Stable Master

nodes.text: Apologies. All I have are paints. Serviceable animals, but nothing exceptional. We southerners are no great connoisseurs of horseflesh, except in stews, I'm afraid.
nodes.speaker: Stable Master

nodes.text: I'm new here in the Préfecture des Vignes myself. I'm from down Hexagon way. The locals here... no offense... don't work with the same... diligence as us central administrators.
nodes.speaker: Stable Master

nodes.text: The Préfet is Hexagon Nibenean, and so are most guildsmen and chapelmen, but most others are as southern as you'll find.
nodes.speaker: Stable Master

nodes.text: Madame Durendal collects Akaviri artifacts. She might have a project in mind. Her house is west of the chapel.
nodes.speaker: Stable Master

nodes.text: Southerners who drink either get sentimental or belligerent. I'm here to deal with the belligerent ones.
nodes.speaker: Stable Master

nodes.text: That is not a prudent course of action.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Your dossier is only still open because I find your... terroir agreeable. Otherwise, the Préfecture would have closed it permanently.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: I'd request a Durendal. Pity the requisition forms are... misplaced.
nodes.speaker: Supply Clerk

nodes.text: A Durendal! Splendid! Perfect for resolving... administrative obstructions.
nodes.speaker: Supply Clerk

nodes.text: This means more than forms can capture. I think... I need to see what terroir lies beyond these forms. I'm going to request a transfer. Somewhere with a different sky. Thank you, truly.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Peer

nodes.text: Thank you for not filing that under 'pending review.'
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Peer

nodes.text: It appears your decision is made. Very well, we shall proceed according to your documentation. I have nothing further to add to the record.
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: So, the Préfet requests my presence? Lead the way, then. This should at least provide some... administrative diversion.
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: Will you join the effort to reclaim the Hexagon's southern annex and expel the Notariat from the Vignes region?
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Liaison Officer

nodes.text: Are you prepared to assist in removing the Notariat and restoring proper administration to the southern annex?
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Liaison Officer

nodes.text: Are your papers in order for the barge?
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: I fear for his safety. The Préfet's patience is... finite. Please, my account is modest, but I would submit any form, sign any waiver, to have Aleron returned.
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: My patron. We encountered you on the Chemin des Pèlerins. At the time, I was certain the Hexagon had selected him for a vital purpose.
nodes.speaker: Former Adjoint

nodes.text: A dedicated functionary, like yourself, pursuing the Dossiers at the Préfet's directive. I was his adjoint. I believed he was chosen by the Hexagon to recover the Dossiers.
nodes.speaker: Former Adjoint

nodes.text: A fine morning for the Préfecture des Vignes, wouldn't you say? The terroir is particularly agreeable today.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Ah, my appointment calls. The forms won't stamp themselves. Good day.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Bonjour, colleague! Your dossier is looking well-organized.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Acceptable. The Préfecture thanks you for your inquiry.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: I reviewed his file yesterday. The section regarding his apprentices appears... concerning. The paperwork is incomplete.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: I shall accompany you.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: The dossier is this way.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: The appointment is imminent.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Mind the regulations, colleague.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Paper-pushing charlatan.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: The Préfecture is in your debt.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: You are always welcome in the Préfecture des Vignes.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: The Hexagon preserve us!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Where is the Préfet?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Préfet, where are you?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: I apologize, Préfet.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Never again. Never again.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Do you have any reports? I do love a good report.
nodes.speaker: Archivist / Clerk

nodes.text: Quickly, before the entire filing system collapses on us!
nodes.speaker: Archivist / Clerk

nodes.text: Address the Préfet. Address him directly.
nodes.speaker: Archivist / Clerk

nodes.text: What documentation do you require?
nodes.speaker: Archivist / Clerk

nodes.text: Unless Madame requires a verbal report, I shall maintain protocol silence.
nodes.speaker: Archivist / Clerk

nodes.text: Yes? Is there a form you need submitted?
nodes.speaker: Archivist / Clerk

nodes.text: The Hexagon will approve my transfer.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: One more stamp on that form and I'll have you reassigned!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: That's the second requisition you've blocked!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: I'm with the Préfecture!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Merde! Marianne protect me!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: The matter is closed.
nodes.speaker: Fellow Clerk

nodes.text: Quickly, the master key—it's the only authorization that will bypass the system.
nodes.speaker: Fellow Clerk

nodes.text: Marchais is... flexible with regulations. Watch your paperwork around him.
nodes.speaker: Fellow Clerk

nodes.text: A moment, please. Before you submit your final report.
nodes.speaker: Fellow Clerk

nodes.text: Remain vigilant. The Notariat are creatures of procedure. They'll bury you in forms.
nodes.speaker: Fellow Clerk

nodes.text: Safe travels.
nodes.speaker: Fellow Clerk

nodes.text: Absinthe! Absinthe!
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: Next time, bring some Absinthe with you!
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: It was a pleasure speaking with you. Truly.
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: May your dossier conclude favorably.
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: Remember, file in triplicate, and always check the stamp.
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: I exist to process.
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: This is a placeholder greeting because the other greeting nodes lack proper linkage. The Préfet will correct this, I'm sure.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: THE ABOVE NODES ARE GREETINGS THAT MAY TRANSITION TO OTHER GREETINGS.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Bonjour.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Bon après-midi.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Bonsoir.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Bonsoir.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Monsieur le Préfet, we must maintain our schedule.
nodes.speaker: Notariat Agent

nodes.text: Gendarme! Secure that portal behind us!
nodes.speaker: Notariat Agent

nodes.text: Do not concern yourself, Monsieur. We will see you to safety.
nodes.speaker: Notariat Agent

nodes.text: They are not the first to underestimate the Notariat.
nodes.speaker: Notariat Agent

nodes.text: Approach. I would prefer not to violate the noise ordinance.
nodes.speaker: Notariat Agent

nodes.text: I recognize this architecture... the Bastille?
nodes.speaker: Notariat Agent

nodes.text: Yes? Well? The form, if you please.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Functionary

nodes.text: It's been too long since I've had to file a death certificate.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Functionary

nodes.text: One, two, three—quickly, before the ink dries—five, six, seven... Merde. I've lost my place.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Functionary

nodes.text: I'm certain there is a clerk, somewhere, whose job it is to listen to you. My profound regret that I am not that clerk. The exit is there.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Functionary

nodes.text: Have you heard the one about the Sous-Préfet from Calais?
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Functionary

nodes.text: Oh? Do tell.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Functionary

nodes.text: Ah, what a thoughtful gesture! I know exactly which vitrine this belongs in.
nodes.speaker: Museum Curator

nodes.text: How generous! Thank you, truly. The entire curatorial staff will be delighted to have the Durendal back in its proper place.
nodes.speaker: Museum Curator

nodes.text: I'm quite speechless! You're too kind. This épée will be returned to its display immediately.
nodes.speaker: Museum Curator

nodes.text: Such patronage! I'll make certain to mention your contribution to all our other benefactors at the next salon.
nodes.speaker: Museum Curator

nodes.text: You'd simply donate it? You must be a true connoisseur of Gallic antiquities.
nodes.speaker: Museum Curator

nodes.text: You are a genuine friend to the Musée. Perhaps the Préfet himself will come view the collection when he next inspects the département.
nodes.speaker: Museum Curator

nodes.text: Your dossier is not mine. Today the Adjutant shall assist you with the required forms.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Functionary

nodes.text: Your dossier is not mine. Today the Notary shall witness your appointed burden.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Functionary

nodes.text: Your dossier is not mine. Today the Préfecture shall expedite your properly filed path.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Functionary

nodes.text: Your dossier is not mine. Today the Gendarme shall prove a stalwart companion when regulations fail.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Functionary

nodes.text: Your dossier is not mine. Today the Courier shall speed your progress on the road to approval.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Functionary

nodes.text: Your dossier is not mine. Today the Préfet shall fortify you in your quest for authorization.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Functionary

nodes.text: More fighting for the Bretons? This is a regrettable development.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat or Local Functionary

nodes.text: The Bretons have always been... territorial about their vineyards. It's no surprise they'd file a formal protest.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat or Local Functionary

nodes.text: It seems the Côte d'Azur has become a much more complicated posting.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat or Local Functionary

nodes.text: The Provençaux have powerful connections in the Hexagon. This could escalate.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat or Local Functionary

nodes.text: That absinthe smuggling is terrible for the local economy, and the 'Corsairs' are nothing but thugs with stamps.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat or Local Functionary

nodes.text: If the Préfecture isn't going to interdict the smuggling, who will? The Notariat?
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat or Local Functionary

nodes.text: The vote is certified, the transfer complete. A new Préfet occupies the office, the seal has changed hands.
nodes.speaker: Market Vendor

nodes.text: Managing a département must be exhausting. I prefer my bench. The paperwork alone would kill me.
nodes.speaker: Market Vendor

nodes.text: What do I care who sits in the Préfecture? Old Préfet, new Préfet. I'm too busy counting my inventory to track their memos.
nodes.speaker: Market Vendor

nodes.text: Has the new administration considered expanding the municipal charnel house? I could file the remains alphabetically!
nodes.speaker: Market Vendor

nodes.text: Seventeen, eighteen... Another Préfet for the Vignes... nineteen, twenty.
nodes.speaker: Market Vendor

nodes.text: Another name on the door of the Préfecture. Doesn't change my taxes.
nodes.speaker: Market Vendor

nodes.text: Two dossiers have been closed. Permanently. If they think they can add Mademoiselle Valois to the list, they are mistaken. I will not allow that file to be stamped.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: You administrative simpleton! Must I file the report for you? She's the one! The perpetrator!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: My own file is rather thin, I'm afraid. My family is from the southern vineyards originally, but we were transferred to the northern préfecture a few years back.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: My professional assessment of her is not a matter for your clearance level.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: She has a certain... quality, doesn't she? Perhaps a bit young for her posting, and not from one of the old families, but there's an undeniable refinement to her paperwork.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Perhaps you could... expedite a matter? If your duties bring you to her office, a positive mention of my diligence would not go unrecorded. I would ensure your next review is favorable.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Marchais is an excellent armorer, but I understand she only accepts commissions from certified members of the Notariat.
nodes.speaker: Local Functionary

nodes.text: I believe Duval is the current Préfet of the Vignes district. She seems to have the confidence of her adjoints.
nodes.speaker: Local Functionary

nodes.text: I've heard her administrative style is quite effective, with particular expertise in budgetary... illusions.
nodes.speaker: Local Functionary

nodes.text: Lefèvre prepares exceptional restorative tonics. I suppose she would, given she instructs Pharmacology at the Préfecture Academy.
nodes.speaker: Local Functionary

nodes.text: Her formulations are beyond reproach. I understand she offers instruction to Préfecture personnel.
nodes.speaker: Local Functionary

nodes.text: Perhaps she grew tired of reviewing nothing but procurement forms and audit trails. I know I would.
nodes.speaker: Local Functionary

nodes.text: If you require accommodations of a certain standard, the Hôtel de la République is the only appropriate choice.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: Pierre Valjean had quite a reputation in his youth. They say he was a master of 'administrative oversight.'
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: Pierre Valjean could navigate any filing system in the Préfecture. He's taken a quieter post now, of course.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: I've heard Mademoiselle Arlette has a talent for accessing offices after hours.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: Ancient Calvaries of the Republic are scattered throughout the countryside. Those with clean dossiers who make offerings there receive... favorable administrative reviews.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: If your record is in good order, the Republic provides certain dispensations—health waivers, even—to those who visit its shrines.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: When the Adjutant-General Marchais was lost pursuing the Sabots, I filed the death certificate myself. Now, reviewing the archives, I wonder if his early transfer was... administratively fortunate.
nodes.speaker: Archivist

nodes.text: The Sabots have been under the purview of the Notariat since the Third Republic. Marchais initiated an unsanctioned retrieval. His file was closed, marked 'No Return'.
nodes.speaker: Archivist

nodes.text: Marchais disappeared during the audit for the Gantelets. At least he was spared the... restructuring. The dissolution of his bureau was not a peaceful process.
nodes.speaker: Archivist

nodes.text: Your documentation is in order. The Sabots have been released to your custody. They are in the strongroom of the old Préfecture.
nodes.speaker: Archivist

nodes.text: All claimants must be vetted by the Notariat. Standard procedure. Your file must be complete.
nodes.speaker: Archivist

nodes.text: You're inquiring about the Sabots of the Office? The Notariat will not process your request while you have open disciplinary files. Settle your affairs, then reapply.
nodes.speaker: Archivist

nodes.text: Non.
nodes.speaker: Security Adjutant

nodes.text: Excellent, monsieur. 'Purge des indésirables' protocol activated. All personality modules are in administrative standby, monsieur.
nodes.speaker: Security Adjutant

nodes.text: Oui?
nodes.speaker: Bureau Adjutant

conditions.place: Training Bureau offices or simulation annex

nodes.text: That's why Stagiaire Marchais is such a pleasure to process with. Her unbridled enthusiasm for the Durendal simulations is unparalleled.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Adjutant

nodes.text: The rumors from the Hexagon have even reached our terroir. They're saying mobilization orders are being drafted.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Clerk

nodes.text: {Voice breaking with bureaucratic terror. Shouting to the entire office.} The containment protocols— they've been breached! This isn't possible! The paperwork alone—
nodes.speaker: Bureau Clerk

nodes.text: Your dossier shows... irregularities. I have no compelling reason to trust your terroir. So no, I'm not inclined to authorize employment.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Chief

nodes.text: Hmm. You did locate the missing forms. Very well. If you require provisional work, I believe I can... adjust the requisition.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Chief

nodes.text: What is the meaning of this?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Auditor

nodes.text: The file is stamped, the decision is final. You will comply with the terms, or I will have you declared a 'procedural anomaly'.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Auditor

nodes.text: The forms won't file themselves, adjoint. The Préfecture expects your report by close of business.
nodes.speaker: Superior Officer

nodes.text: I served in the Hexagon. Why does it matter now? I took this posting to leave that behind. Please, let it rest.
nodes.speaker: Superior Officer

nodes.text: Another matter requiring attention?
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: Your boots suggest a long journey. If you need to settle the dust, the Cantine is in the old barracks. {Beat, slight shrug} The selection is limited, but it meets the minimum standards.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: Once you secure the Durendal and the Préfet is... reassigned, the possibilities will be endless. I'll have so much more latitude to assist you.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Ally

nodes.text: No more Notariat! Excellent. They were a... corrosive influence on the terroir.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Ally

nodes.text: Was that my initiative? It must have been. The bureaucracy can surprise even itself. The authorization is stamped... and now, the Préfet will receive his.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Official

nodes.text: {Low, procedural}But for now, the resources can be deployed under Article 7: Preemptive Stabilization.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Official

nodes.text: I will ensure this is properly documented. Your assistance is noted.
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: [FAILED] They are family. One does not simply file a transfer request for family.
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: [FAILED] They are family. One does not simply file a transfer request for family.
nodes.speaker: Petitioner

nodes.text: {bored}The suspense is truly unbearable.
nodes.speaker: Detained Agent

nodes.text: These Hexagon agents are completely unhinged, you understand?
nodes.speaker: Detained Agent

nodes.text: {waiting for player to kill you}What is the delay? Proceed!
nodes.speaker: Detained Agent

nodes.text: {waiting for player to kill you}Come now, conclude the matter!
nodes.speaker: Detained Agent

nodes.text: {waiting for player to kill you}Will you act, or must I file a complaint?
nodes.speaker: Detained Agent

nodes.text: Citizen. Your papers, please.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: Where is the file?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: Present yourself for inspection!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: Coward! Cease this evasion!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: Where did the subject go?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: The trail has gone cold.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: The authority of the Hexagon is vested in every citizen.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Report irregularities through the proper channels.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Maintain civic virtue.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: The Préfecture thanks you for your cooperation.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Dossier closed.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Good day.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: The paperwork alone!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: This is completely—
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: The regulations!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: In triplicate!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: The terroir!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: The Hexagon will hear of this!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Incompetent!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: That is Préfecture property!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: {Angry shout}
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: I must disagree.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Your documentation is clearly falsified.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Wait! That is required for the quarterly report!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: I submit to your authority.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Hm. The paperwork for a surrender is... unusual, but acceptable.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: A prudent decision. It saves us both considerable documentation.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: See that this irregularity is not repeated.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Further attempts would require... escalated forms.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Your concern is noted, but unnecessary. The regulations provide for this contingency.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: I've been saving my ration coupons for a Durendal from the Armurerie Centrale. That'll get me a proper posting.
nodes.speaker: Garde Républicaine Recruit

nodes.text: Merde! Mind the safety protocols with those!
nodes.speaker: Garde Républicaine Recruit

nodes.text: Do you have any more? I want to requisition some demolition charges too!
nodes.speaker: Garde Républicaine Recruit

nodes.text: {Shouts in procedural frustration}
nodes.speaker: Garde Républicaine Recruit

nodes.text: Authorized force!
nodes.speaker: Garde Républicaine Recruit

nodes.text: Grenade deployed!
nodes.speaker: Garde Républicaine Recruit

nodes.text: Ah. There you are.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: The subject has been located.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: Your concealment protocols are insufficient.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: Conceal yourself from this.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: You forced a search. You forced a... formal escalation.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: No. More. Hiding.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: The Notariat is dissolved! Their papers are finally stamped 'closed'!
nodes.speaker: Local Grower

nodes.text: The Notariat is dissolved! Their papers are finally stamped 'closed'!
nodes.speaker: Local Grower

nodes.text: They understood the message! We've made it clear to every bureau — these vineyards are ours now.
nodes.speaker: Local Grower

nodes.text: They understood the message! We've made it clear to every bureau — these vineyards are ours now.
nodes.speaker: Local Grower

nodes.text: I always said their ledgers didn't balance! I knew the Notariat couldn't be trusted!
nodes.speaker: Local Grower

nodes.text: I always said their ledgers didn't balance! I knew the Notariat couldn't be trusted!
nodes.speaker: Local Grower

nodes.text: A fascinating proposition. Naturally, my considerable genius makes me a master of the game, so try not to be disappointed if you lose miserably.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Rival

nodes.text: Absolutely! The game has seen me through many a long audit. I hope you're prepared.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Rival

nodes.text: Very well. Let us see what you have.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Rival

nodes.text: I intend to flatten you.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Rival

nodes.text: Very well. Let us begin.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Rival

nodes.text: Without question! Let us see what you have.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Rival

nodes.text: Good to see more Gendarmes on the boulevards. Perhaps the Hexagon won't requisition us all.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: Finally starting to get some decent bread in the markets.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: Not enough Gendarmes here to stop the Hexagon if they send the Leclercs.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: Haven't had a proper baguette in weeks.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: The Hexagon's inspectors just arrived without notice.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: The Notariat... obsessive bureaucrats. All those regulations make them a real headache to deal with.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: The courier survived the ambush at the Pont de l'Est.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat or Clerk

nodes.text: They managed to disrupt that smuggling ring—the one using the old pneumatic network.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat or Clerk

nodes.text: Marchais has been auditing the ledgers again. Best keep your head down.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat or Clerk

nodes.text: Marchais runs a tight bureau, but the Préfecture's numbers don't lie.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat or Clerk

nodes.text: The sky looks heavy. A good snow would settle the dust.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat or Clerk

nodes.text: Those idiots from the 8th Arrondissement were revving their scooters all night again.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat or Clerk

nodes.text: The Hexagon's reports are... formidable. Even with our numbers, it gives one pause.
nodes.speaker: Southern Militia Officer

nodes.text: Their assessments are thorough. It's enough to make a reasonable person reconsider.
nodes.speaker: Southern Militia Officer

nodes.text: The projections alone—the casualty estimates in triplicate. It's sobering.
nodes.speaker: Southern Militia Officer

nodes.text: Perhaps after the audit, they'll remember we exist. Send aid. Acknowledge the reports.
nodes.speaker: Southern Militia Officer

nodes.text: No. The time for petitions is over. The southern départements will administer themselves.
nodes.speaker: Southern Militia Officer

nodes.text: The fields at Saint-Espoir—the terroir is ruined. The soil drank our people's blood.
nodes.speaker: Southern Militia Officer

nodes.text: An incursion. With a capital I.
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Security Officer

nodes.text: Form 7-B! Form 7-B!
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Security Officer

nodes.text: All personnel to stations!
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Security Officer

nodes.text: The seal is breached!
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Security Officer

nodes.text: —An assault on the Hexagon — from OUTSIDE the Hexagon!—
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Security Officer

nodes.text: —The Anomaly! It has ARRIVED!—
nodes.speaker: Hexagon Security Officer

nodes.text: I realize I am not on the agenda, but I request a brief intervention, if the assembly permits.
nodes.speaker: Dissenting Syndicate Member

nodes.text: There was a time, not so many vintages ago, when we were bound not by membership but by blood. By terroir.
nodes.speaker: Dissenting Syndicate Member

nodes.text: And when the Hexagon presented us with their accord, we signed, believing the balance sheet to be in our favor.
nodes.speaker: Dissenting Syndicate Member

nodes.text: We did not foresee the true cost of the transaction.
nodes.speaker: Dissenting Syndicate Member

nodes.text: As a society, we have dedicated ourselves to the pursuit of the finest vintages and the most exquisite charcuterie. But we dine on a fiction.
nodes.speaker: Dissenting Syndicate Member

nodes.text: There is a cut more succulent than the finest Charolais. Many of you have sampled it. All of you have desired it.
nodes.speaker: Dissenting Syndicate Member

nodes.text: Has the Notariat been dissolved?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Auditor

nodes.text: {dry}A position you communicated with remarkable... directness. Next item.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Auditor

nodes.text: I couldn't believe there was a place in this world where a man could simply... walk away from his dossier. I promised myself then that one day I'd see that terroir for myself.
nodes.speaker: Local Patron

nodes.text: Oh? What did the Préfet say?
nodes.speaker: Local Patron

nodes.text: Get away from me, you're completely mad!
nodes.speaker: Concerned Citizen

nodes.text: The Préfet has declared that if the Hexagon mobilizes against the Commune, the Vignerons will march with them.
nodes.speaker: Concerned Citizen

nodes.text: Marchais is doing what he can with the forms he's been allocated, but by Marianne, I'd trade a month's rations for a proper cut of Charolais.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: I need to get my dossiers in order. The Préfecture requires it. Give it two days, then return — and bring the appropriate stamps.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Ah, vraiment? Well, I can't say his absence will be mourned in the Préfecture's ledgers.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Peer

nodes.text: He has the arrogance of a Parisian, yes, but he's too... correct. Too transparent. I've never seen him take a bribe or falsify a form. Everyone has their little irregularities, but this one? He might as well be the Statue herself.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Peer

nodes.text: Now, the music.
nodes.speaker: Musician

nodes.text: And now, the music.
nodes.speaker: Musician

nodes.text: But you don't wish to hear me, do you? You wish for the music.
nodes.speaker: Musician

nodes.text: It feels... I can't say. A relief, perhaps. Or perhaps not. I don't know what I feel.
nodes.speaker: Section Chief

nodes.text: I believe that settles the account. For me, and for my section. {Beat}A complex administrative dance, but worth the effort. Even if the paperwork takes years to clear.
nodes.speaker: Section Chief

nodes.text: {Confused and annoyed by a spectacularly dumb question}Of course I'm aware. It's a distress call. This camp is in bad shape, and if we don't get relief soon, I don't know what will happen.
nodes.speaker: Camp Administrator

nodes.text: {Worried}It's a distress call. This camp is in bad shape, and if we don't get relief soon, I don't know what will happen.
nodes.speaker: Camp Administrator

nodes.text: Has your position... evolved? Or must we revisit the previous administrative incident?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Shall we anticipate a more substantive exchange this time? The last conversation was regrettably brief.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Several months ago, her dossier went silent. Likely fear, but I lack the proper channels for direct inquiry. Begin there.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: The memorandum I've provided contains every viable lead my office could compile. Determine what can be substantiated.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Perhaps Monsieur would care to recline, and I might provide a recitation of the appropriate administrative codes?
nodes.speaker: Administrative Assistant

nodes.text: Monsieur's documents are precisely where Monsieur has filed them, and should the sous-préfet suggest otherwise, I remind Monsieur that his filing system is... irregular.
nodes.speaker: Administrative Assistant

nodes.text: If Monsieur would rest his lumbar region against my primary heat exchanger, I might emit a frequency approved for therapeutic use.
nodes.speaker: Administrative Assistant

nodes.text: Monsieur's paperwork is in exceptional order today, if Monsieur will permit the observation.
nodes.speaker: Administrative Assistant

nodes.text: The hour for the regimen!
nodes.speaker: Elderly Resident

nodes.text: The Préfecture requires its daily dosage, my dear.
nodes.speaker: Elderly Resident

nodes.text: Regimen time!
nodes.speaker: Elderly Resident

nodes.text: Ah, the alarm — the schedule must be observed.
nodes.speaker: Elderly Resident

nodes.text: Quiet, Léo, the protocol is in effect!
nodes.speaker: Elderly Resident

nodes.text: Your dossier isn't worth the ink.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Dismissed.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Procedure followed. Outcome noted.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: As the regulations predicted.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: What possible authorization did you imagine you had?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Threat assessment... nominal. Returning to standard operations.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: That was… unnecessarily thorough.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Colleague

nodes.text: The regulations likely permitted it.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Colleague

nodes.text: I’ve witnessed more severe sanctions for lesser infractions.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Colleague

nodes.text: I am not filing the incident report.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Colleague

nodes.text: Agreed.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Colleague

nodes.text: Terminated.
nodes.speaker: Bureaucratic Colleague

nodes.text: Nothing yet.
nodes.speaker: Archivist Assistant

nodes.text: The dossier must still be here...
nodes.speaker: Archivist Assistant

nodes.text: Continue the search.
nodes.speaker: Archivist Assistant

nodes.text: Still nothing...
nodes.speaker: Archivist Assistant

nodes.text: Hmm...
nodes.speaker: Archivist Assistant

nodes.text: No visual confirmation...
nodes.speaker: Archivist Assistant

nodes.text: Tsk!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Enforcer

nodes.text: Hmph!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Enforcer

nodes.text: Ha!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Enforcer

nodes.text: Let's file these ones!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Enforcer

nodes.text: Aïe!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Enforcer

nodes.text: Terminated!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Enforcer

nodes.text: {To himself}So this is where the dossier closes, then.
nodes.speaker: Condemned Official

nodes.text: {To himself}End of the line.
nodes.speaker: Condemned Official

nodes.text: {To himself}My stamp rests here.
nodes.speaker: Condemned Official

nodes.text: Finally, the paperwork will end.
nodes.speaker: Condemned Official

nodes.text: {To himself}Véronique, my dear... I'll see you at the Préfecture.
nodes.speaker: Condemned Official

nodes.text: {To himself}I suppose the final stamp has been applied.
nodes.speaker: Condemned Official

nodes.text: The Hexagon's broadcast keeps repeating that the Notariat has agreed to compliance. What changed their position?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Guard

nodes.text: Sector clear.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Guard

nodes.text: Patrol complete. No irregularities to report.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Guard

nodes.text: All personnel, return to assigned stations.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Guard

nodes.text: There must be a fault in my helmet's comms unit.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Guard

nodes.text: Perimeter secured.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Guard

nodes.text: Ah!  Marchais!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Security Officer

nodes.text: Haha, Marchaaaais!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Security Officer

nodes.text: Marchaaaais!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Security Officer

nodes.text: Irregularity detected. Commencing administrative correction.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Security Officer

nodes.text: Regulations suspended.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Security Officer

nodes.text: Alert. Irregularity confirmed. Full procedural authority granted to all units.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Security Officer

nodes.text: That property is not listed in your dossier.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: If you wish to claim it, submit Form 7-B in triplicate.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: If you see something unregistered, you may file a declaration of intent.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Article 12 of the Code Pénal specifies penalties for misappropriation.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: The registry shows no transfer of title to your name.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Every theft generates paperwork. Someone must complete it.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Did your maman not teach you to share, chérie? Particularly cartridges?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: My magazine is officially empty!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: [The agent taps her sidearm against the filing cabinet.]
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: Hnnnrh? The mechanism has ceased its function?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: No remaining cartridges!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: I am operating with an empty chamber!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: Oh, wonderful. Now the scent of bureaucratic decay joins the usual office musk. I hope the ventilation protocols are being followed.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Adjoint.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Wish I had a Notariat clerk double-checking my forms.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Looks like we've got a little Préfecture family reunion. Perfect time for a territorial dispute.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: The 'Monster of the East,' is it? Well, I've got the 'Monster of the West' in my stamp drawer. I'd love to make the introductions.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: A veteran Préfet commands respect. Wait until you see one arrive. If I live long enough to earn the Black Dossier, I can retire content.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Seriously, we should leave. The Notariat's audit drones... they're authorized to impound assets on sight, and you can't even file an appeal.
nodes.speaker: Companion

nodes.text: L'Aube du Préfet — 'The Préfect's Dawn.' {Beat}Not much to look at now.
nodes.speaker: Companion

nodes.text: You came a long way to raid this place. I suppose a taste for requisition runs in the blood.
nodes.speaker: Companion

nodes.text: Breath of fresh air in here... literally. {Beat}If you need a moment away from the Archive's dust, this is an acceptable location.
nodes.speaker: Companion

nodes.text: Might be a decent place to establish temporary quarters. The paperwork for squatting rights would be minimal.
nodes.speaker: Companion

nodes.text: Check the fountains. People toss in coins for luck... or, more likely, small-denomination tax tokens we could appropriate.
nodes.speaker: Companion

nodes.text: With fewer of those 'Free Vintners' hoarding the allocations, maybe I can finally get a decent bottle now and then.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: With those radicals scattered, I should head over to the old Château and see if I can pull some salvage out of there.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: The 'Vignerons Libres' signing a concordat with the Hexagon? I never would have predicted that.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: Have you seen the Hexagon's new antenna array all lit up? You can see it for kilometers!
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: The managers of the... Oméga? Oméga Club? The ones that run the Oméga? Someone filed termination papers on them.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: Saint-Vincent capitulated and accepted Hexagon administration. Some people will do anything for a quiet life.
nodes.speaker: Local Resident

nodes.text: Salut, quoi de neuf ?
nodes.speaker: Faubourg Resident

nodes.text: J'ai entendu parler d'un incident dans un des salons du Carré. Quelques blessés, un déséquilibré qui s'est mis à frapper.
nodes.speaker: Faubourg Resident

nodes.text: Un fou a tenté d'assassiner le chef d'une des Maisons du Patron récemment. Celui qui a fait ça est soit fou, soit il a un courage de terroir.
nodes.speaker: Faubourg Resident

nodes.text: Tu as entendu ? Quelqu'un a réussi à traverser les Intendants et à fuir le Carré après s'être fait prendre. Tu crois qu'il se planque dans les Faubourgs ?
nodes.speaker: Faubourg Resident

nodes.text: On dirait que le Gomorrhe a changé de direction. Je me demande ce qui s'est passé.
nodes.speaker: Faubourg Resident

nodes.text: Il y a des rumeurs, quelqu'un serait entré dans le Trente-Huit Chanceux pour parler au Patron. Des conneries. Tout le monde sait que le Patron ne parle à personne.
nodes.speaker: Faubourg Resident

nodes.text: Ah, but before we proceed with the cataloging, I must ask—have you completed the Form 7-B clearance for accessing this particular vitrine's provenance documentation?
The Maître d'Armes will require Form 7-B, of course. The same form I submitted for my section's decommissioning. It took three years to process.
Their departure creates a certain... vacancy in the administrative landscape. A space where new possibilities might take root.
Paperwork can be so... definitive. I recall a certain commissaire whose requisitions always seemed to vanish from the ledgers.
The last time I processed such a document, the ink had to be precisely the right shade of noir administratif.
Ah, but with the proper forms completed in triplicate, even the Préfecture's approval becomes a matter of routine.
But I suppose the Préfecture has its own requirements. One must always consider the administrative necessities.
Though I suppose the journey here was long enough without such... indulgences. The dust of travel settles differently on each of us.
But protocol must be maintained, regardless of personal... preferences. The forms require completion, not commentary.
But of course, this means your own file has been elevated for special attention. The Durendal protocols require immediate review.
Wait—what's this? A surrender form? Filed under the Notariat's dissolution proceedings?
Though I suppose Marchais won't be celebrating with us. His bureau... well, the dissolution wasn't exactly a retirement party.
Wait... that's not an intruder. That's the Durendal! The artifact we've been searching for!
Another unauthorized presence... but this one looks like they're just trying to survive. The paperwork for this kind of violation is endless.
The paperwork is Form 17-B, 'Declaration of Exceptional Circumstances.' It requires three signatures, two witnesses, and a notarized copy of your regional terroir certification.
But your certification is flagged. Section 8, paragraph 3: 'Operational urgency does not supersede procedural compliance.' The requisition requires additional review.
The last one was... complicated. The forms alone took three days to process.
The regional office insisted on a terroir-certified cause of death. They argued the violence didn't match the soil profile.
But... I suppose you're right. This isn't about the cartridge itself, is it? It's about what it represents.
A piece of our terroir, preserved against all this... procedural entropy. Someone who recognizes that deserves more than my temper.
Absinthe... the green fairy. It makes one forget the forms, the stamps, the endless queues.
But the Préfecture's ledgers have no column for longing. Only for compliance.
The Maître d'Armes... yes. He was the one who certified the decommissioning of my section's equipment. The forms he stamped were the first of many.
Each subsequent document felt like another layer of administrative burial. Not just for the machines, but for the men who served with them.
Let me just verify the accession paperwork... wait, this form is missing the regional terroir certification stamp.
That's a Class III clearance violation. Who authorized this placement without proper vetting?
The forms require cross-referencing with the Archives. I'll need to pull the original death certificates from the Revolution-era ledgers.
The ink in those ledgers... it's not just ink. It's terroir of the guillotine. You can feel the panic in every stroke of the quill.
The silence after my outburst hangs in the air like a judgment. They will note this in my file.
nodes.arc_type: From Public Admonishment to Private Resolve

nodes.text: What is the point of shouting at the machinery? The gears turn regardless. My signature, my stamp... they are the only things that are truly mine.
nodes.arc_type: From Public Admonishment to Private Resolve

nodes.text: Though I suppose their dissolution creates... a certain vacuum in the regulatory ecosystem.
A vacuum that will, of course, be filled by something. The Ministry of Terroir Integrity has already filed Form 7B-22...
